snippet.title: The Unliving | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Unliving is a roguelite game with strategy and RPG elements developed by RocketBrush Studio and published by Team17. You'll raise the dead as a fearsome Necromancer and Lead your undead legions into an endless fight. Watch the trailer for a first look into the story and some gameplay!

Wishlist The Unliving on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/986040/The_Unliving/

The Unliving Official website: https://theunlivinggame.com  
Follow The Unliving on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheUnlivingGame
Follow The Unliving on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theunlivinggame
Follow The Unliving on VK: https://vk.com/theunliving
RocketBrush Studio's official website: https://rocketbrush.com
Follow RocketBrush on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RocketBrush
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Moving Out, The Escapists, My Time At Portia, Overcooked, The Survivalists, Hell Let Loose, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info. 

bit.ly/SubTeam17
